msg: Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'r1' must be of type 'string', but here has type 'number'.
Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'r2' must be of type 'boolean', but here has type 'string'.
Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'r3' must be of type 'number', but here has type 'boolean'.
This condition will always return 'false' since the types '"string" | "number" | "bigint" | "boolean" | "symbol" | "undefined" | "object" | "function"' and '"Object"' have no overlap.
Subsequent variable declarations must have the same type.  Variable 'r4' must be of type 'C', but here has type 'string'.
